+ Wikid Pad Installation Directory

This refers to the directory where You have installed Your WikidPad application.

Note: Under MsWindows, this installation directory is file:///C|/Program%20Files/WikidPad by default.

Under MsWindows, this es where the "WikidPad.exe" MsWindowsBinary is installed.
